title: Favorite Part of What I Love
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Riko-san, I brought the book I borrowed the other day. It was very interesting. Thank you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Did you like it, Setsuna-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Of course. Your recommendations are amazing, Riko-san. Every book gets me fired up<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fired up….? Really….? Then I’m glad. When I read this book, I got so anxious and excited too, my chest starts to tighten really hard<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I totally get that. The passionate plot development gets your heart beating and keeps you on the edge of your seat…. It makes you feel anxious of what would happen next and gets your chest all tensed up<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I also love when all the tense feelings turn into emotional moments that melt your heart<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Me too. It’s so satisfying that it makes me want to start running♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufufufu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Fufufufu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Actually, I brought another book with me today that I want to lend you, Setsuna-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Really!? Thank you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
